about_the_game:
In Nebula Flow, your dog is guiding you through various musical realms.
Follow its path by moving and jumping in sync with the music.
Each note spawned by your dog closes the gap between the two of you, and leaves you with less time to react to what's coming.
Hit enough notes to fill your boost bar and use it to give your dog its lead back.

Supports keyboard, mouse, and gamepad.
Settings for audio latency available. Gameplay elements colors can be customized.

A game by Nico and Songe.
Pixel art by Daniel "DanieruArt" Reis.
Original soundtrack by Songe.

short_description: Nebula Flow is a music game where you follow the melodic trail charted by your dog across colorful pixel art landscapes. Stock up on notes to power your canine companion to the end of each song!
